welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bolzano, Italy! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this picturesque city known for its stunning Alpine scenery, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bolzano has to offer. Buon viaggio!
